title: Welcome to the Bourbon Club!
body_md: Scan you bar receipt each time you try a new bourbon, and we'll keep a list for you of everything you've tried! You can even assign stars to note what you thought about each. There's a Leader Board to give some props to the most adventurous players. But best of all, you'll get invitations to events, specials, and new releases!

title: Friday Thing
body_md: This one is only going to show up on Friday. Just a little test of the date filtering stuff.
